articles.title: 'Magnificent 7' check-in: Why these 3 names might not 'belong'
articles.content: Spear Invest founder and chief investment officer Ivana Delevska joins BD8 Capital Partners CEO and chief investment officer Barbara Doran and Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to check in on the "Magnificent Seven," noting the growing dissimilarities between stock names. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

articles.title: Five Themes for Investors to Watch as Earnings Season Kicks Off
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- In just three months, US stocks have swung from a dramatic April selloff to new heights. articles.title: Wall Street hits record highs as Nvidia tops $4T and Trump ramps up trade tensions
articles.content: The chipmaker extended its winning streak to a seventh consecutive week — and the 11th in the last 12 — nearly doubling its share price from early April lows in just over three months.

articles.title: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against Apple Inc. and Certain Officers - AAPL
articles.content: NEW YORK, July 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Apple Inc. and certain officers.   The class action, filed in the United States...

articles.title: Nvidia Makes History as the First $4 Trillion Company. Will It Reach $5 Trillion?
articles.content: Nvidia briefly eclipsed a $4 trillion valuation on Wednesday.  Nvidia's growth is closely tied to the expansion of AI data centers.  Investors need to see Nvidia's growth stay rapid to justify its stock price.

articles.title: Prediction: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Could Be Worth More Than Apple by 2030
articles.content: Apple's growth is slowing down.  Broadcom's XPU is becoming a popular alternative for AI computing.  Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) is flirting with that line, as its artificial intelligence (AI) strategy has largely underperformed and lags behind its peers in this arena.
